23.21: Sɛ mohyɛ Awurade, mo Nyankopɔn no, bɔ a, biribiara a mohyɛɛ no ho bɔ no, monyɛ no ntɛm so. Efisɛ ɛdan dɛn ara a Awurade, mo Nyankopɔn no, bɛdan mo ka na mubedi bɔne ho fɔ.
23.22: Nanso sɛ moanhyɛ biribiara ho bɔ a, monyɛɛ bɔne biara.
23.23: Na sɛ wo ara wufi wo pɛ mu hyɛ bɔ a, hwɛ yiye na di asɛm a woaka no so, efisɛ Awurade, mo Nyankopɔn no, na woafi wo pɛ mu de wʼano ahyɛ no bɔ.
23.24: Wutumi di bobe aba dodow biara a wopɛ wɔ wo yɔnko bobeturo mu, nanso mfa bi ngu kɛntɛn mu nkɔ.
23.25: Saa ara na mubetumi de mo nsa abubu atoko kakra wɔ mo yɔnko afum, nanso ɛnsɛ sɛ mode afoa twa.

24.1: Sɛ ɔbarima ware yere na sɛ nʼani nnye ne ho bio, efisɛ wahu ade bɔne bi wɔ ne ho, na sɛ ɔkyerɛw awaregyae krataa de ma no, na ɔpam no fi ne fi,
24.2: na ofi fi hɔ na ɔbarima foforo kɔware no,
24.3: na ne kunu a ɔto so abien no gyaa no anaasɛ owu a,
24.4: ne kunu a odi kan a ogyaa no no nni ho kwan sɛ ɔware no bio, bere a ne ho agu fi akyi no. Ɛyɛ akyiwade wɔ Awurade ani so. Mommfa afɔbu mma asase a Awurade, mo Nyankopɔn no, de rema mo sɛ agyapade no so.
24.5: Sɛ ɔbarima aware foforo a, ɛnsɛ sɛ wɔde no kɔ ɔko anaasɛ wɔde dwuma bi di to no so. Ɛsɛ sɛ ɔtena fie afe a ɔnyɛ adwuma biara sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a, ɔbɛma ne yere foforo a waware no no anya ahotɔ.
24.6: Monnnye adeyam bo ne ne boba anaa ne ba no nko ara nsi ka ano, ɛba saa a na moagye ne wura no ano aduan sɛ akagyinamde.
24.7: Sɛ obi kyere ne yɔnko Israelni na odi no nya sɛ ɔdɔnkɔ anaa ɔtɔn no a, ɛsɛ sɛ owifo no wu. Ɛsɛ sɛ mutu bɔne ase fi mo mu.
24.8: Monhwɛ ɔhonam ani nsanyare nyinaa yiye na munni ho mmara a Lewifo asɔfo bɛkyerɛ mo no so. Munni ahyɛde a mede ama wɔn no so pɛpɛɛpɛ.
24.9: Monkae nea bere a mufi Misraim reba no Awurade, mo Nyankopɔn no, yɛɛ Miriam.
24.10: Sɛ wode biribi fɛm wo yɔnko a, nkɔ wo yɔnko fi nkogye akagyinamde.
24.11: Gyina afikyiri na ma ɔyɔnko a ɔfɛm wʼade no mfa akagyinamde no mmrɛ wo.
24.12: Sɛ ɔyɔnko no yɛ ohiani a, nkora akagyinamde no nkosi adekyee.
24.13: Enkosi owiatɔbere no na wode ntama no akɔma wo yɔnko no na ɔde ada. Na ɔbɛda wo ase, na wɔbɛfa no sɛ ade trenee wɔ Awurade, wo Nyankopɔn no, ani so.
24.14: Nhyɛ ɔpaani mmɔborɔni a ɔyɛ wo nua Israelni anaa ɔhɔho a ɔte mo nkurow no mu bi mu no so.
24.15: Tua nʼapaade ma no da biara ansa na owia akɔtɔ, efisɛ ɔyɛ ohiani na nʼani da saa akatua no so. Anyɛ saa a, obesu afrɛ Awurade atia wo, na wubedi bɔne ho fɔ.
24.16: Ɛnsɛ sɛ wokum awofo wɔ wɔn mma bɔne bi a wɔayɛ ho. Saa ara nso na ɛnsɛ sɛ wokum mma wɔ awofo bɔne bi a wɔayɛ ho. Ɛsɛ sɛ obiara wu wɔ nʼankasa bɔne ho.
24.17: Ɛnsɛ sɛ mubu ahɔho a wɔte mo mu ne nyisaa ntɛnkyew, anaasɛ mugye ɔbea kunafo ntama de di akagyinamu.
24.18: Daa monkae sɛ, na mo nso moyɛ nkoa wɔ Misraim na Awurade, mo Nyankopɔn no, na ogyee mo. Ɛno nti na mehyɛ mo sɛ monyɛ eyi no.
24.19: Sɛ moretwa mo mfuw mu nnɔbae, na mo ani pa nnɔbae no bi so a, monnsan nkɔfa. Monnyaw ma ahɔho, nyisaa ne akunafo sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a Awurade, mo Nyankopɔn no, behyira mo nsa ano nnwuma nyinaa so.
24.20: Sɛ motew wo ngonnua so aba a, monkɔ so mprenu. Monnyaw aba a aka wɔ so no mma ahɔho, nyisaa ne akunafo.
24.21: Saa nso na motew wo bobe nturo so aba a, monkɔ so mprenu; na monnyaw aba a aka wɔ so no mma ahɔho, nyisaa ne akunafo.
24.22: Monkae sɛ, moyɛɛ nkoa wɔ Misraim. Ɛno nti na mehyɛ mo sɛ monyɛ eyi no.

25.1: Sɛ akasakasa si nnipa bi ntam a, wɔmfa asɛm no nkɔ asennii na atemmufo no nni asɛm no. Wobegyaa nea odi bem no na wɔatwe de odi fɔ no aso.
25.2: Sɛ nea odi fɔ no fata sɛ wotwa no mmaa a, atemmufo no bɛma no ada hɔ na wɔatwa no mmaa dodow a ɛfata ne bɔne no wɔ nʼanim.
25.3: Nanso ɛnsɛ sɛ otemmufo no ma wotwa mmaa boro aduanan. Sɛ wotwa boro saa a, na wɔagu wo yɔnko Israelni anim ase wɔ wʼanim.
25.4: Nkyekyere nantwi a ɔreporow atoko ano.
25.5: Sɛ nuabarimanom baanu te fie na wɔn mu baako wu a wanwo ɔba a, ɛnsɛ sɛ okunafo no kɔware ɔhɔho. Mmom, ne kunu a wawu no nuabarima na ɛsɛ sɛ ɔware okunafo no ma ɔyɛ okunu nua no asɛde.
25.6: Wɔde abakan a wɔbɛwo no no bɛto nʼagya a wawu no sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a owufo no din rempepa mfi Israel.
25.7: Na sɛ ɛba sɛ owufo no nuabarima mpɛ sɛ ɔware ne nua no yere no a, ɔbea no bɛkɔ kurow no mpanyimfo nkyɛn wɔ kurow no pon ano akɔka akyerɛ wɔn se, “Me kunu nua no mpɛ sɛ ne nua no din bɛka Israel. Ɔrenyɛ okunu nua asɛde mma me.”
25.8: Afei, ɔbarima no kurom mpanyimfo bɛfrɛ no akasa akyerɛ no. Sɛ ose pene ara na ɔrempene nti ɔka se, “Mempɛ sɛ meware no a,”
25.9: okunafo no bɛkɔ ɔbarima no anim a mpanyimfo no nso wɔ hɔ bi. Ɔbɛworɔw ɔbarima no mpaboa baako, ate ntasu agu nʼanim na waka se, “Sɛɛ na ɛsɛ sɛ wɔyɛ ɔbarima a ɔmpɛ sɛ ɔtoa ne nua abusua so.”
25.10: Wɔbɛfrɛ saa onipa no asefo wɔ Israel se Abusua a Wɔaworɔw wɔn Mpaboa.
25.11: Sɛ Israelfo mmarima baanu reko na wɔn mu baako yere pɛ sɛ ɔboa ne kunu nti, oso ɔbarima baako no barima mu a,
25.12: ɛsɛ sɛ motwa ɔbea no nsa no a ahummɔbɔ biara nni mu.
25.13: Monnkita nsania ahorow abien a baako yɛ duru na baako yɛ hare.
25.14: Monnkora olonka ahorow abien a baako so na baako su wɔ mo fi.
25.15: Momfa nsania ne olonka a ɛyɛ pɛpɛ na nokwaredi wɔ mu nsusuw aguade na moanya nkwanna tenten wɔ asase a Awurade, mo Nyankopɔn no, de rema mo no so.
25.16: Wɔn a wɔfa nsania bɔne ne nkontompo so kari aguade no yɛ Awurade, mo Nyankopɔn no, akyiwade.
25.17: Monkae nea Amalekfo yɛɛ mo bere a mufi Misraim reba no.
25.18: Wɔtow hyɛɛ mo so bere a moabrɛbrɛ na moatotɔ beraw no na wɔn a wɔaka akyi no nso, wɔbobɔɔ wɔn hwehwee fam. Na wonsuro Onyankopɔn.
25.19: Sɛ Awurade, mo Nyankopɔn no, ma mo ahomegye fi mo atamfo nyinaa nsam, wɔ asase a ɔde rema mo sɛ agyapade no so a, ɛsɛ sɛ mosɛe Amalekfo na wɔankae wɔn bio wɔ asase yi so. Mommma mo werɛ mfi eyi da!

26.1: Otwa Afɔrebɔde Ne Ntotoso Du DuSɛ mudu asase a Awurade, mo Nyankopɔn no, de rebɛma mo sɛ mo agyapade no so na moko gye, na motena so a,
26.2: momfa otwakan wɔ otwabere biara mu no ngu kɛntɛn mu na momfa mmra baabi a Awurade, mo Nyankopɔn no, bɛpaw sɛ wɔnkamfo ne din wɔ hɔ no,
26.3: na monkɔ ɔsɔfo a ɔwɔ hɔ saa bere no nkyɛn nkɔka nkyerɛ no se, “Meda no adi nnɛ akyerɛ Awurade, mo Nyankopɔn no, sɛ Awurade de me aba asase a ɔkaa ho ntam kyerɛɛ yɛn agyanom no so.”
26.4: Afei, ɔsɔfo no begye kɛntɛn no afi wo nsam de asi Awurade, mo Nyankopɔn no, afɔremuka no anim.
26.5: Na wobɛka saa nsɛm yi wɔ Awurade, mo Nyankopɔn no, anim sɛ, “Na me tete agya Yakob yɛ ɔkwantuni Aramni a ɔkɔtenaa Misraim. Nʼabusua no yɛ ketewaa bi, nanso Misraim hɔ no, wɔdɔɔso bebree bɛyɛɛ ɔman kɛse.
26.6: Bere a Misraimfo dii yɛn nya nam so ma yɛyɛɛ wɔn nkoa no,
26.7: yesu frɛɛ Awurade, yɛn agyanom Nyankopɔn no. Ɔtee yɛn sufrɛ na ohuu yɛn amanehunu, ɔbrɛ ne ɔhyɛ a na yɛwɔ mu.
26.8: Enti Awurade nam tumi a ɛyɛ nwonwa, ehu a emu yɛ den, nsɛnkyerɛnne a epusuw nnipa ne anwonwasɛm so gyee yɛn fii Misraim.
26.9: Ɔde yɛn baa ha na ɔde asase yi a nufusu ne ɛwo resen so yi maa yɛn.
26.10: Afei, Awurade, mede akyɛde a ɛyɛ mʼaduankan a wode fi asase mu maa me no rebrɛ wo.” Afei, fa aduan no si Awurade, mo Nyankopɔn no, anim na sɔre no.
26.11: Afei, kɔ na wo ne Lewifo ne ahɔho a wɔte mo mu no nkogye mo ani wɔ nneɛma pa a Awurade, mo Nyankopɔn no, de ama wo ne wo fifo no ho.
26.12: Afe a ɛto so abiɛsa a ɛyɛ ntotoso du du afe a woayi wo nnɔbae so ntotoso du du awie no ɛsɛ sɛ mode ma Lewifo, ahɔho, nyisaa ne akunafo sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a wobedidi amee wɔ mo nkurow so.
26.13: Afei, mompae mu nka wɔ Awurade, mo Nyankopɔn no, anim se, “Mede akyɛde kronkron a efi me fi ama Lewifo, ahɔho, nyisaa ne akunafo sɛnea wohyɛɛ me no. Mimmuu wʼahyɛde bi so anaa me werɛ mfii wo mmara no mu biara ɛ.
26.14: Manni akronkronne no bi bere a meretwa adwo no, na bere a na me ho ntew no nso, mamfa me nsa anka bi; na mamfa mu bi nso amma awufo. Matie Awurade, me Nyankopɔn no, na mayɛ biribiara a wohyɛɛ me sɛ menyɛ no.
26.15: Fi wo soro tenabea kronkron hɔ hwɛ fam na hyira wo nkurɔfo Israel ne asase a wode ama yɛn no—asase a nufusu ne ɛwo resen wɔ so sɛnea wode ntam hyɛɛ yɛn agyanom bɔ no.”
26.16: Awurade Mmara Sodi Ho NkaebɔAwurade, mo Nyankopɔn no, hyɛ mo nnɛ sɛ, munni saa ahyɛde ne mmara yi nyinaa so; momfa mo koma ne mo kra nyinaa nni so pɛpɛɛpɛ.
26.17: Moapae mu aka no nnɛ se, Awurade yɛ, mo Nyankopɔn, na mobɛnantew nʼakwan so na mubedi ne mmara so ayɛ osetie ama no.
26.18: Na Awurade aka no nnɛ se, moyɛ ne nkurɔfo, nʼagyapade a ne koma da ho sɛnea ɔhyɛɛ bɔ no; ɛno nti, ɛsɛ sɛ mudi nʼahyɛde nyinaa so.
26.19: Na sɛ moyɛ saa a, ɔbɛyɛ mo kɛse asen ɔman biara. Afei, mubenya nkamfo ne anuonyam a ɛboro aman a wayɛ no nyinaa de so. Mobɛyɛ ɔman a ɛyɛ kronkron ama Awurade, mo Nyankopɔn no, sɛnea ɔhyɛɛ bɔ no.

27.1: Bepɔw Ebal AfɔremukaMose ne Israel mpanyimfo hyɛɛ ɔmanfo no se, “Munni mmara a mede rema mo nnɛ yi nyinaa so.
27.2: Sɛ mutwa Yordan kodu asase a Awurade, mo Nyankopɔn no, de rema mo no so a, monhyehyɛ abo akɛse na momfa akaadoo nsra ho.
27.3: Sɛ mutwa Yordan kɔ asase a Awurade, mo Nyankopɔn no, de rema mo no so, asase a ɛwo ne nufusu resen so no so a, monkyerɛw mmara no nyinaa ngu so sɛnea Awurade, mo agyanom Nyankopɔn, hyɛɛ mo bɔ no.
27.4: Na sɛ mutwa Yordan a, monhyehyɛ abo yi wɔ Ebal bepɔw so sɛnea merehyɛ mo nnɛ yi na momfa akaadoo nsra ho.
27.5: Munsi afɔremuka, abo afɔremuka wɔ hɔ mma Awurade, mo Nyankopɔn no. Mommfa dade biribiara nka.
27.6: Momfa abo amuamu nsi Awurade, mo Nyankopɔn no, afɔremuka no na mommɔ ɔhyew afɔre wɔ so mma Awurade, mo Nyankopɔn no.
27.7: Mommɔ asomdwoe afɔre nso wɔ so na momfa anigye nnidi wɔ hɔ wɔ Awurade, mo Nyankopɔn no, anim.
27.8: Monkyerɛw mmara no mu nhyehyɛe nyinaa pɛpɛɛpɛ ngu abo a wɔde akaadoo asra ho no so.”
27.9: Nnome A Efi Bepɔw Ebal SoAfei, Mose ne Lewifo asɔfo kasa kyerɛɛ Israelfo no se, “Israel, monyɛ komm na muntie! Nnɛ, moabɛyɛ Awurade, mo Nyankopɔn no, manfo.
27.10: Monyɛ osetie mma Awurade, mo Nyankopɔn no, na munni ne mmara ne nʼahyɛde a mede rema mo nnɛ yi so.”
27.11: Saa da no ara, Mose hyɛɛ ɔmanfo no se:
27.12: Sɛ mutwa Asubɔnten Yordan a Simeon, Lewi, Yuda, Isakar, Yosef ne Benyamin mmusuakuw na wonnyina Gerisim bepɔw so nhyira ɔman no.
27.13: Ruben, Gad, Aser, Sebulon, Dan ne Naftali mmusuakuw nso nnyina Ebal bepɔw so nnome.
27.14: Lewifo nteɛteɛ mu nworo ngu nnipa a wɔwɔ Israel nyinaa so se:
27.15: “Nnome nka onipa a ɔbɛyɛ ohoni a wɔasen anaa nea wɔagu de ahyɛ kokoa mu. Saa ahoni, adwumfo nsa ano nnwuma yi yɛ Awurade akyiwade.”Na ɔman no nyinaa begye so se, “Amen!”
27.16: “Nnome nka obiara a obebu nʼagya anaa ne na animtiaa.”Na ɔman no nyinaa begye so se, “Amen!”
27.17: “Nnome nka obiara a opia ɔhye nam so bɔ ne yɔnko korɔn.”Na ɔman no nyinaa begye so se, “Amen!”
27.18: “Nnome nka obiara a ɔma onifuraefo fom kwan.”Na ɔman no nyinaa begye so se, “Amen!”
27.19: “Nnome nka obiara a osisi ahɔho, nyisaa ne akunafo.”Na ɔman no nyinaa begye so se, “Amen!”
27.20: “Nnome nka obiara a ɔne nʼagya yere bɛda, efisɛ wagu nʼagya mpa ho fi.”Na ɔman no nyinaa begye so se, “Amen!”
27.21: “Nnome nka obiara a ɔne aboa bɛda.”Na ɔman no nyinaa begye so se, “Amen!”
27.22: “Nnome nka obiara a ɔne ne nuabea bɛda, sɛ ɔyɛ nʼagya babea anaa ne na babea.”Na ɔman no nyinaa begye so se, “Amen!”
27.23: “Nnome nka obiara a ɔne nʼasebea bɛda.”Na ɔman no nyinaa begye so se, “Amen!”
27.24: “Nnome nka obiara a obekum ɔfoforo wɔ kokoa mu.”Na ɔman no nyinaa begye so se, “Amen!”
27.25: “Nnome nka obiara a ogye apaade, kum onipa a ɔnyɛɛ bɔne biara.”Na ɔman no nyinaa begye so se, “Amen!”
27.26: “Nnome nka obiara a wanni mmara nsɛm yi so na wannye anto mu.”Na ɔman no nyinaa begye so se, “Amen!”

28.1: Osetie Mu NhyiraNa sɛ mutie Awurade, mo Nyankopɔn no, na mudi mmara a mede rema mo nnɛ yi so a, Awurade, mo Nyankopɔn no, bɛpagyaw mo wɔ aman a wɔwɔ wiase nyinaa no so.
28.2: Sɛ mutie Awurade, mo Nyankopɔn no, a mubenya saa nhyira yi nyinaa:
28.3: Wobehyira mo wɔ mo nkurow ne mo man mu.
28.4: Wobehyira mo yafunu mu aba, ne mo nsase so nnɔbae, ne mo nyɛmmoa, nantwimma ne nguamma.
28.5: Wɔde nnuaba nkɛntɛn amaama, ne mmɔre korow a brodo no ahyɛ ma behyira mo.
28.6: Wobehyira mo fieba mu ne mo adifi mu.
28.7: Sɛ atamfo tow hyɛ mo so a, Awurade bedi wɔn so. Wobefi baabi atow ahyɛ mo so na wɔafa akwan ason so ahwete, afi mo anim.
28.8: Biribiara a mobɛyɛ no, Awurade behyira so na obehyira mo asan. Awurade, mo Nyankopɔn no, behyira mo wɔ asase a ɔde rema mo no so.
28.9: Sɛ mudi Awurade, mo Nyankopɔn no, ahyɛde so na moyɛ osetie ma no a, Awurade begyina mo sɛ ne nnipa kronkron sɛnea ɔhyɛɛ mo bɔ sɛ ɔbɛyɛ no.
28.10: Afei, asase so nnipa nyinaa behu sɛ, moyɛ nnipa a Awurade de ne din afrɛ mo na wobesuro mo.
28.11: Awurade bɛma mo yiyedi a ɛboro so–mo yafunu mu aba, nyɛmmoa mma ne mo asase so nnɔbae—wɔ asase a ɔhyɛɛ mo agyanom bɔ sɛ ɔde bɛma mo no so.
28.12: Awurade fi nʼahonya dodow a ɛwɔ soro no mu bɛma osu atɔ wɔ ne bere mu, nam so ahyira mo nnwuma a moyɛ so. Mobɛfɛm aman pii, nanso mo de, moremfɛm hwee mfi wɔn nkyɛn.
28.13: Sɛ mutie saa Awurade, mo Nyankopɔn no, ahyɛde a mede rema mo nnɛ yi na mudi so pɛpɛɛpɛ a, Awurade bɛyɛ mo eti na ɛnyɛ bodua, na moakorɔn daa.
28.14: Ɛnsɛ sɛ moman fa benkum anaa nifa fi ahyɛde a mede rema mo nnɛ yi biara ho sɛ morekodi anyame foforo akyi asom wɔn.
28.15: Asoɔden Ho NnomeNa sɛ moantie Awurade, mo Nyankopɔn no, anni ne mmara ne nʼahyɛde a mede rema mo nnɛ yi nyinaa so pɛpɛɛpɛ a, saa nnome yi nyinaa bɛba abebunkam afa mo so.
28.16: Nnome bɛka mo wɔ mo nkuropɔn ne mo man mu.
28.17: Wɔde nkɛntɛn a aduaba biara nni mu ne mmɔre korow a brodo nni mu bɛdome mo.
28.18: Wɔbɛdome wo yafunu aba, ne wʼasase so nnɔbae. Ne wo nyɛmmoa mu nantwimma ne nguamma.
28.19: Wɔbɛdome wo fieba ne wo adifi.
28.20: Awurade bɛma nnome, basabasayɛ ne huammɔdi aba ade biara a moyɛ mu, kosi sɛ awiei no wɔbɛsɛe mo koraa sɛ moayɛ bɔne na moagyaw no nti.
28.21: Awurade de nyarewa bɛba mo so akosi sɛ ɔbɛsɛe mo nyinaa wɔ asase a morebɛkɔ akɔfa no so.
28.22: Awurade de ɔyare a ɛbɛma mo afonfɔn bɛka mo. Ɔbɛma atiridii ne ahonhon abɔ mo na wama ɔhyew a ano yɛ den, nnɔbae nyarewa ne kakawirewire aba mo so na ahaw mo ara akosi sɛ mo ase bɛtɔre.
28.23: Ɔsoro a ɛkata mo ti so no bɛdan sumpii na fam adan dade.
28.24: Awurade bɛdan osutɔ a ɛwɔ mo man mu no mfutuma; ɛbɛtɔ afi soro agu mo so akosi sɛ mobɛsɛe.
28.25: Awurade bɛma mo adi nkogu wɔ mo atamfo anim. Mobɛfa baabi akɔtow ahyɛ mo atamfo so, nanso mobɛfa akwan ahorow ason so aguan afi wɔn anim. Mobɛyɛ atantanne ama ahenni a ɛwɔ asase yi so no nyinaa.
28.26: Mo afunu bɛyɛ nnomaa ne wuram mmoa aduan na obiara nso nni hɔ saa bere no a, ɔbɛpam wɔn.
28.27: Awurade bɛma mpɔmpɔ a esisii wɔ Misraim no bi asisi mo. Na ɔde mpɔmpɔ, ntutui ne ntwom a wɔrentumi nsa bɛbobɔ mo.
28.28: Awurade de adammɔ, anifurae ne adwene mu basabasayɛ bɛto mo so.
28.29: Mode mo nsa bɛkeka awia ketee te sɛnea onifuraefo de ne nsa keka anadwo no. Biribiara a moyɛ no, morenni mu nkonim. Wɔbɛhyɛ mo so, abɔ mo korɔn daa na obiara remmegye mo.
28.30: Mubesi ɔbea asiwa nso obi bɛhyɛ no ne no ada. Mubesi dan, nanso morentena mu. Mobɛyɛ bobeturo nanso morenni mu aba.
28.31: Wobekum mo nantwi wɔ mo anim, nanso morennya ne nam bi nwe. Wobegye mo afurum afi mo nsam a wɔrensan mfa mmrɛ mo. Wɔde mo nguan bɛma mo atamfo na morennya ɔboafo a obegye wɔn ama mo.
28.32: Wɔde mo mmabarima ne mo mmabea bɛma ɔman foforo na daa mobɛhwɛ wɔn ara ama mo ani atɔ dwe nanso morentumi nyɛ ho hwee.
28.33: Nnipa a munnim wɔn na wɔbɛfow mo brɛ so ade adi na daa wɔasan ahyɛ mo so.
28.34: Mo ani so ade a mubehu no bɛbɔ mo dam.
28.35: Awurade bɛma mpɔmpɔ a ɛyɛ yaw a wɔko a ɛnkɔ abobɔ mo nkotodwe ne mo anan ho na atrɛw afi mo nantin akosi mo mpampam.
28.36: Awurade bɛpam mo ne mo hene a odi mo so no akɔ ɔman bi a mo ne mo agyanom nnim so so. Ɛhɔ na mobɛsom anyame afoforo, anyame a wɔde nnua ne abo ayɛ.
28.37: Mobɛyɛ atantanne, akyiwade ne aserewde ama aman a Awurade de mobɛkɔ so no nyinaa so.
28.38: Mubedua bebree wɔ mo nsase so, nanso mubetwa kakraa bi, efisɛ mmoadabi bɛwe mo nnɔbae.
28.39: Mobɛyɛ bobe nturo ahwɛ so yiye nanso morennom anaa morenni so aba, efisɛ asunson bedi.
28.40: Mubedua ngonnua afa mo nsase so nyinaa, nanso morennya mu ngo biara, efisɛ ngo aba no bɛtetew agu fam.
28.41: Mobɛwo mmabarima ne mmabea, nanso nyɛ mo na mobɛtetew wɔn, efisɛ wɔbɛkɔ nnommum mu.
28.42: Mmoadabi kuw bɛfa mo asase so nnua ne nnɔbae.
28.43: Ahɔho a wɔte mo mu no bɛkorɔn abunkam mo so, nanso mobɛkɔ so amem akɔ fam.
28.44: Wɔbɛbɔ mo bosea a moremmɔ wɔn bi. Wɔbɛyɛ eti na moayɛ dua.
28.45: Sɛ moanyɛ osetie amma Awurade, mo Nyankopɔn no, anni ahyɛde a ɔde ama mo no so a, saa nnome yi nyinaa bɛba mo so na ebedi mo akyi na abunkam afa mo so akosi sɛ wɔbɛsɛe mo.
28.46: Saa nsɛm a ɛyɛ hu yi bɛba sɛ nsɛnkyerɛnne ne kɔkɔbɔ ama mo ne mo asefo daa nyinaa.
28.47: Esiane sɛ moamfa anigye ne ahosɛpɛw ansom Awurade, mo Nyankopɔn no, wɔ bere a esii mo yiye no, nti,
28.48: enti mubefi ɔkɔm ne osukɔm, adagyaw ne ohia buruburoo mu asom mo atamfo a Awurade, mo Nyankopɔn no, bɛsoma wɔn aba mo so no. Wɔbɛhyɛ mo nnade konnua akosi sɛ mobɛsɛe.
28.49: Awurade de ɔman bi a ɛwɔ akyirikyiri baabi, wɔ asase ano, ɔman a monte wɔn kasa no, bɛba mo so na wɔatow ahyɛ mo so te sɛnea ɔkɔre sian no,
28.50: ɔman a wɔn ho yɛ hu na wommu ɔpanyin, na wonni ahummɔbɔ mma mmofra.
28.51: Nʼasraafo bɛtow ahyɛ mo nyɛmmoa ne mo asase so nnɔbae so adi no fuu akosi sɛ mubewuwu. Wɔrennyaw atoko, nsa foforo anaa ngo; mo nyɛmmoa nantwimma anaa nguamma kosi sɛ mobɛsɛe.
28.52: Wobetua mo nkuropɔn nyinaa ano akosi sɛ wɔbɛka mo afasu dennen a mode mo ho too so sɛ ɛbɛbɔ mo ho ban wɔ mo asase no so no nyinaa no agu. Wobetua asase a Awurade, mo Nyankopɔn no, de rema mo no so nkuropɔn no nyinaa ano.
28.53: Esiane ɔhaw ne abɛbrɛsɛ a ɔtamfo de bɛba mo so wɔ bere a wɔatua mo ano no mu no nti, mobɛwe mo yafunu mu aba, mo mmabarima ne mmabea a Awurade mo Nyankopɔn no de ama mo no nam.
28.54: Mpo, mo mu ɔhobrɛaseni a nʼani da hɔ no renhu ɔno ara ne nuabarima anaa ne yere a ɔdɔ no, anaa ne mma a wɔte ase no mmɔbɔ,
28.55: na ɔremma wɔn mu biara ne mma no mu bi nam a ɔrewe no. Esiane sɛ ɛno ara ne nea aka a ɔbɛwe wɔ bere a mo atamfo atua mo nkuropɔn no nyinaa ano rehiahia mo ho no nti.
28.56: Mo mu ɔbea a ɔbrɛ ne ho ase na ɔwɔ nkatede wɔ ne mu, a mpo ɔmpɛ sɛ ɔde ne nantin besi fam no benya ne kunu a ɔdɔ no ne ɔno ara ne mmabarima anaa ne mmabea ho menasepɔw.
28.57: Ɔbea no de awo akyi ade ne abofra a wawo no foforo no besie wɔn sɛnea obetumi awe ne nyinaa wɔ kokoa mu, esiane ɔhaw ne abɛbrɛsɛ a mo atamfo de bɛba mo so, bere a wɔatua mo nkuropɔn ano no nti.
28.58: Sɛ moanni mmara a wɔakyerɛw wɔ saa nhoma yi mu no nyinaa so pɛpɛɛpɛ, na moanni saa onuonyamfo ne ɔnwonwani Awurade, mo Nyankopɔn no, no din ni a,
28.59: Awurade de ɔyaredɔm a ɛyɛ hu bɛba mo ne mo asefo. Ɛbɛyɛ atoyerɛnkyɛm a ano yɛ den ne ɔyaredɔm a ano yɛ den na ɛbɛtena hɔ akyɛ.
28.60: Ɔde ɔyaredɔm ahorow a ɛbaa wɔ Misraim a ɛbɔɔ mo hu no bɛba bɛtena mo so.
28.61: Awurade de nyarewa ahorow bebree ne atoyerɛnkyɛm a wɔnkyerɛw wɔ Mmara Nhoma yi mu no bɛbrɛ mo akosi sɛ mobɛsɛe.
28.62: Mo a na modɔɔso te sɛ ɔsoro nsoromma no, mo so bɛtew koraa, efisɛ moantie Awurade, mo Nyankopɔn no.
28.63: Sɛnea na ɛyɛ Awurade anisɔ sɛ ɔbɛma mo adi yiye na moadɔɔso no, saa ara nso na ɛbɛyɛ no anisɔ sɛ ɔbɛdwerɛw mo na wasɛe mo. Obetutu mo ase afi asase a morekɔ so akɔfa no so.
28.64: Na Awurade bɛbɔ mo apansam afra aman nyinaa afi asase ano akosi asase ano. Ɛhɔ na mobɛsom ahɔho anyame a mo anaa mo agyanom nhuu bi da; anyame a wɔde nnua ne abo ayɛ!
28.65: Morennya guankɔbea anaa homebea mma mo anantin wɔ saa aman no so. Ɛhɔ na Awurade bɛma mo adwene a ɛpere, aniwa a ayɛ siamoo ne koma a apa abawa.
28.66: Mo asetena bedi nsensɛnmu daa, na ehu bɛhyɛ mo so anadwo ne awia a munnim nea ɛrekɔ so wɔ mo asetena mu.
28.67: Anɔpa mobɛka se, “Sɛ ɛyɛɛ anwummere a!” Na anwummere nso mobɛka se, “Sɛ ɛyɛɛ anɔpa a!” Mobɛka saa, esiane ehu a ɛbɛhyɛ mo koma amaama ne nea atwa mo ho ahyia a mo ani behu no.
28.68: Na Awurade bɛma mo atenatena ahyɛn mu asan akɔ Misraim, akwantu a mehyɛɛ sɛ ɛnsɛ sɛ mutu bio no. Ɛhɔ na mode mo ho bɛma mo atamfo sɛ wɔntɔ mo sɛ nkoa, nanso obiara rempɛ sɛ ɔbɛtɔ mo.

29.1: Apam No NtimuEyinom ne nhyehyɛe a ɛwɔ apam a Awurade hyɛɛ Mose sɛ ɔne Israelfo no nyɛ wɔ Moab nka apam a ɔne wɔn yɛɛ no wɔ Horeb no mu no ho.
29.2: Mose frɛɛ Israelfo no nyinaa ka kyerɛɛ wɔn se:Moahu nea Awurade yɛɛ Farao ne ne mpanyimfo ne ne man nyinaa wɔ Misraim no.
29.3: Mo ankasa muhuu sɔhwɛ akɛse, nsɛnkyerɛnne a ɛyɛ hu ne anwonwade akɛse no.
29.4: Nanso de besi nnɛ yi, Awurade mmaa mo adwene a ɛte asɛm ase anaa ani a ehu ade anaa aso a ɛte asɛm.
29.5: Nanso Awurade se, mfe aduanan a midii mo anim faa sare so no mu no, mo ntama antetew, na mo mpaboa a ɛhyehyɛ mo anan nso anhwere.
29.6: Moanni brodo, annom nsa anaa nsa a ano yɛ den. Meyɛɛ saa sɛnea mubehu sɛ mene Awurade, mo Nyankopɔn no.
29.7: Yeduu ha no, Hesbonhene Sihon ne Basanhene Og ba bɛko tiaa yɛn, nanso yedii wɔn so.
29.8: Yɛfaa wɔn asase de maa Ruben ne Gad mmusuakuw ne Manase abusuakuw no fa sɛ wɔn agyapade.
29.9: Ɛno nti, munni saa apam yi so sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a biribiara a mobɛyɛ no bɛyɛ yiye.
29.10: Mo nyinaa—mo mmusuakuw mpanyimfo, mo atemmufo, mo ahwɛfo ne Israel mmarima nyinaa, nnɛ mugyina Awurade, mo Nyankopɔn no, anim;
29.11: mo ne mo mma ne mo yerenom ne ahɔho a wɔte mo mu a wobu mo nnua, soa mo nsu.
29.12: Mugyina ha sɛ mo ne Awurade, mo Nyankopɔn no, rebɛyɛ apam; apam a Awurade ne mo reyɛ nnɛ na ɔde ntam resɔw ano
29.13: na wasi so gyinae sɛ nnɛ, moyɛ ne nkurɔfo na ɔno nso bɛyɛ mo Nyankopɔn, sɛnea ɔhyɛɛ mo bɔ no na ɔkaa ntam kyerɛɛ mo agyanom Abraham, Isak ne Yakob no.
29.14: Mereyɛ saa apam yi a ne ntam bata ho a, ɛnyɛ mo nko a,
29.15: mo ne yɛn gyina ha nnɛ wɔ Awurade, mo Nyankopɔn no, anim na mmom, wɔn a wonni ha nnɛ nso ka ho bi.
29.16: Mo ankasa munim sɛnea yɛtenaa Misraim ne sɛnea yɛreba ha no yɛfaa aman so besii ha.
29.17: Muhuu akyiwade ahoni a wɔde nnua ne abo ne dwetɛ ne sikakɔkɔɔ ayɛ wɔ wɔn nkyɛn.
29.18: Monhwɛ yiye sɛ ɔbarima anaa ɔbea anaa abusua biara a ɛwɔ mo mu nnɛ no mu biara koma rennan mfi Awurade, mo Nyankopɔn no, ho nkɔsom saa aman yi anyame; monhwɛ sɛ ntin biara nni mo mu a epuw bɔre a ɛyɛ nwen saa.
29.19: Sɛ saa onipa no te ntam yi mu nsɛm na ohyira ne ho, na ɔka wɔ ne tirim se, “Me ho sɔnn, ɛmfa ho sɛ menam asoɔden kwan so.” Eyi de atoyerɛnkyɛm bɛba asase a so afɔw ne nea so awo no nyinaa so.
29.20: Awurade remfa nkyɛ saa onipa no. Nʼabufuw ne ne ninkunu bɛdɛw atia no. Nnome a wɔakyerɛw no saa nhoma yi mu no nyinaa bɛba ne so na Awurade bɛpepa ne din afi ɔsoro ase.
29.21: Awurade bɛtwe no afi Israel mmusuakuw nyinaa mu na wahwie apam no mu nnome nyinaa a wɔakyerɛw wɔ saa mmara nhoma no mu no agu ne so.
29.22: Mo mma a wɔbɛba wɔ daakye awo ntoatoaso mu no ne wɔn a wofi ahɔho ase a wofi akyirikyiri asase so behu asase no sɛe ne nyarewa a Awurade de bɛbrɛ asase no.
29.23: Wobehu sɛ, wɔn asase no nyinaa adan sufre ne nkyene a wonnua so hwee, na hwee mfifi wɔ so na ahabammono biara nnyina so, a ɛnyɛ yiye na hwee nso nnyin wɔ so; sare ahaban mpo. Ɛbɛyɛ sɛ Sodom ne Gomora, Adma ne Seboim a Awurade sɛee no nʼabufuwhyew mu no.
29.24: Aman a atwa ahyia no bebisa se, “Adɛn nti na Awurade ayɛ saa asase yi saa? Adɛn nti na ne bo fu dennen saa?”
29.25: Na wɔbɛka akyerɛ wɔn se, “Saa asɛm yi sii, efisɛ nnipa a wɔwɔ asase no so buu apam a wɔne Awurade, wɔn agyanom Nyankopɔn no, yɛe bere a oyii wɔn fii Misraim asase so no.
29.26: Wɔdan kɔsom anyame afoforo wɔkotow wɔn, anyame a wonnim wɔn, anyame a Awurade nkyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ wɔnsom.
29.27: Ɛno nti Awurade abufuw dɛw tiaa saa asase yi, nam so de nnome a wɔakyerɛw wɔ saa nhoma yi mu no nyinaa baa wɔn so no.
29.28: Abufuwhyew mu, Awurade tutuu ne nkurɔfo ase fii wɔn asase so twaa wɔn asu de wɔn koguu asase foforo so, sɛnea ɛte mprempren yi.”
29.29: Kokoamsɛm yɛ Awurade, yɛn Nyankopɔn no, dea, nanso nneɛma a wɔda no adi no yɛ yɛn ne yɛn asefo dea daa, sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a yebedi saa mmara yi mu nsɛm so.

30.1: Awurade Nkyɛn Ba Mu YiyediSɛ nhyira ne nnome a mede ato mo anim no nyinaa ba mo so, na mode hyɛ mo koma mu wɔ baabiara a Awurade, mo Nyankopɔn no, bɛfa mo akɔ, wɔ aman no mu,
30.2: na mo ne mo mma san ba Awurade, mo Nyankopɔn no, nkyɛn, na mode mo koma ne mo kra nyinaa yɛ osetie ma no sɛnea merekyerɛ mo nnɛ yi a,
30.3: ɛno de, Awurade, mo Nyankopɔn no, de mo siade bɛma mo, na wahu mo mmɔbɔ, na waboaboa mo ano bio afi amanaman a ɔbɔɔ mo hwete kɔɔ so no nyinaa so, asan de mo aba.
30.4: Sɛ mpo, wɔapam mo kɔ akyirikyiri asase bi a ɛwɔ ɔsoro ase a, efi hɔ no, Awurade, mo Nyankopɔn no, bɛboaboa mo ano asan de mo aba.
30.5: Ɔde mo bɛba asase a ɛyɛ mo agyanom de no so na moafa sɛ agyapade. Ɔbɛma mo adi yiye na moadɔɔso asen mo agyanom.
30.6: Awurade, mo Nyankopɔn no, beyi fi a ɛwɔ mo ne mo asefo koma mu no sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a mode mo koma ne mo kra nyinaa bɛdɔ no na moanya nkwa.
30.7: Awurade, mo Nyankopɔn no, de saa nnome yi nyinaa begu mo atamfo a wɔtaa mo no so.
30.8: Mobɛsan atie, adi Awurade ahyɛde a mede rema mo nnɛ no nyinaa so.
30.9: Awurade, mo Nyankopɔn no, bɛma biribiara a moyɛ no asi mo yiye. Ɔbɛma mo yafunu mu aba asi yiye pii. Mo nyɛmmoa bɛdɔɔso. Na mo mfuw mu nnɔbae nso bebu so, efisɛ Awurade, mo Nyankopɔn no, ani begye sɛ ɔbɛma mo adi yiye sɛnea na ɔyɛ mo agyanom no.
30.10: Sɛ mutie Awurade, mo Nyankopɔn no, nne, na mudi nʼahyɛde ne ne mmara a wɔakyerɛw wɔ saa Mmara Nhoma no mu no so, na mode mo koma ne mo kra dɔ no a, nʼani begye mo yiyedi ho.
30.11: Owu Ne NkwaNokware, saa mmara a merehyɛ ama mo nnɛ yi sodi nyɛ den na ɛnyɛ ade a morentumi nyɛ nso.
30.12: Enni ɔsoro a enti mobɛka se, “Hena na ɔbɛkɔ ɔsoro ama yɛn na wakogye abrɛ yɛn, na yɛate adi so?”
30.13: Saa ara nso na enni po agya a enti mobɛka se, “Hena na obetwa akɔ ɛpo fa nohɔ ama yɛn na wakogye abrɛ yɛn, na yɛate adi so?”
30.14: Dabi, asɛm no abɛn wo. Ɛda wʼano na ɛwɔ wo koma mu sɛ mudi so.
30.15: Muntie, nnɛ, mede nkwa ne yiyedi, owu ne ɔsɛe asi mo anim.
30.16: Na Sɛ mutie Awurade, mo Nyankopɔn no, mmara a merehyɛ ama mo nnɛ yi, nam so dɔ Awurade, mo Nyankopɔn, nantew nʼakwan mu, di ne mmara so a, mubenya nkwa na mo ase adɔ, na Awurade, mo Nyankopɔn behyira mo wɔ asase a morekɔ akɔtena so no so.
30.17: Nanso sɛ mo koma dan, sɛ moanyɛ osetie, na sɛ wɔtwe mo kɔkotow anyame afoforo, na mosom wɔn a,
30.18: mepae mu ka kyerɛ mo nnɛ sɛ, nea ɛte biara no wɔbɛsɛe mo; morentena asase a moretwa Yordan akɔ so akɔfa sɛ agyapade no so nkyɛ.
30.19: Nnɛ mede nkwa ne owu, nhyira ne nnome, asi mo anim sɛ munyi nea mopɛ. Mefrɛ ɔsoro ne asase sɛ nnansefo. Momfa nkwa sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a mo ne mo asefo benya nkwa!
30.20: Monnɔ Awurade, mo Nyankopɔn no, monyɛ osetie mma no, na momfa mo ho mma no, efisɛ ɔno ne mo nkwa. Ɛno na mobɛtena ase akyɛ wɔ asase a Awurade kaa ntam sɛ ɔde bɛma mo tete agyanom; Abraham, Isak ne Yakob no.

31.1: Yosua Di Mose AdeBere a Mose kaa saa nsɛm yi kyerɛɛ Israelfo wiee no,
31.2: ɔkaa bio se, “Mprempren madi mfe ɔha ne aduonu, nti merentumi nni mo anim bio. Awurade aka akyerɛ me sɛ merentwa Asubɔnten Yordan.
31.3: Nanso Awurade, mo Nyankopɔn no, ankasa bedi mo anim atwa. Ɔbɛsɛe aman a wɔte hɔ na mobɛfa wɔn asase no. Yosua ne onipa foforo a obedi mo anim sɛnea Awurade hyɛɛ mo bɔ no.
31.4: Awurade bɛsɛe aman aman a wɔte asase no so no sɛnea ɔsɛee Sihon ne Og a na wɔyɛ Amorifo ahemfo no.
31.5: Awurade de nnipa a wɔte hɔ no bɛhyɛ mo nsa na ɛsɛ sɛ mo ne wɔn di no sɛnea mahyɛ mo no.
31.6: Monyɛ den na mo bo nyɛ duru! Munnsuro wɔn! Awurade, mo Nyankopɔn no, bedi mo anim. Ɔrenni mo huammɔ na ɔrennyaw mo nso.”
31.7: Afei, Mose frɛɛ Yosua ka kyerɛɛ no wɔ Israelfo no nyinaa anim se, “Yɛ den na yɛ nnam, na wo na wode ɔman yi bɛkɔ asase a Awurade kaa wɔn agyanom ntam sɛ ɔde bɛma wɔn no so; na wo na wobɛkyɛ ama wɔn.
31.8: Awurade na ɔredi wʼanim. Ɔbɛka wo ho; ɔrenni wo huammɔ na ɔrennyaw wo nti nsuro na mma wo koma ntu!”
31.9: Mmara No KenkanAfei, Mose kyerɛw mmara yi too hɔ; ɔde maa Lewifo asɔfo a wɔsoaa Awurade apam adaka no ne Israel mpanyimfo nyinaa.
31.10: Mose hyɛɛ wɔn se, “Mfe ason biara awiei, Asese Afahyɛ mu no, wɔmfa obiara ka a ɔde no nkyɛ no.
31.11: Israelfo nyinaa nhyia wɔ Awurade mo Nyankopɔn no, anim wɔ faako a ɔbɛkyerɛ no, na moakenkan saa mmara yi wɔ wɔn anim ama wɔate.
31.12: Frɛ nnipa no nyinaa, mmarima, mmea, mmofra ne ahɔho a wɔte mo nkurow so nso sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a wɔbɛte na wobesua sɛ, ɛsɛ sɛ wosuro Awurade, mo Nyankopɔn no, na wobedi mmara no so pɛpɛɛpɛ
31.13: na ama wɔn mma a wonnim mmara no ate na wɔasua sɛnea ɛsɛ sɛ wosuro Awurade, mo Nyankopɔn no, mmere dodow a mote asase a moretwa Yordan akɔfa sɛ agyapade no so.”
31.14: Wɔka Israel Asoɔden Ho AsɛmAwurade ka kyerɛɛ Mose se, “Wo wu bere aso. Frɛ Yosua na fa no kɔ Ahyiae Ntamadan no mu, faako a mede nʼadwuma bɛhyɛ ne nsa no.” Enti Mose ne Yosua kɔdaa wɔn ho adi wɔ Ahyiae Ntamadan no mu.
31.15: Na Awurade yii ne ho adi kyerɛɛ wɔn wɔ omununkum fadum mu, na omununkum no gyinaa ntamadan no abobow ano.
31.16: Awurade ka kyerɛɛ Mose se, “Ɛrenkyɛ wubewu na woakɔka wʼagyanom ho, na ɛrenkyɛ na saa nnipa yi de wɔn ho bɛma anyame hɔho a wɔwɔ asase a wɔrekɔ so no so no. Wobegyaw me na wɔabu apam a me ne wɔn hyehyɛɛ no so.
31.17: Na saa da no, me bo befuw wɔn na mapo wɔn; mede mʼanim behintaw wɔn na wɔbɛsɛe wɔn. Ɔhaw a emu yɛ den ahorow pii bɛba wɔn so ama wɔabisa se, ‘So ɛnsɛ sɛ saa ɔhaw yi ba, esiane sɛ Onyankopɔn nni yɛn nkyɛn bio no nti?’
31.18: Saa bere no mede mʼanim behintaw wɔn esiane wɔn bɔne ahorow a wɔayɛ wɔ anyame afoforo a wɔsom no nti.
31.19: “Afei, monkyerɛw saa dwom yi mu nsɛm mfa na monkyerɛ Israelfo no, na wɔnto sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ adansede ama me na mede atia wɔn.
31.20: Mede wɔn bɛba asase a nufusu ne ɛwo resen wɔ so sɛnea mekaa ntam hyɛɛ wɔn agyanom bɔ no. Na wodidi mee yɛ akɛse a, afei, wɔbɛdan wɔn ani akɔsom anyame afoforo apo me, nam so abu mʼapam no so.
31.21: Afei, ɔhaw ne akwanside bebree ba wɔn so a, dwom yi bedi adanse atia wɔn, efisɛ wɔn asefo werɛ remfi da. Minim nea wotumi yɛ koraa ansa na mede wɔn bɛba asase a maka ho ntam ahyɛ bɔ no so.”
31.22: Enti Mose kyerɛw dwom no guu hɔ saa da no na ɔkyerɛɛ Israelfo no.
31.23: Afei, Awurade hyɛɛ Nun babarima Yosua sɛ, “Yɛ den na yɛ nnam, efisɛ wo na wode Israelfo no bɛba asase a mekaa ntam hyɛɛ ho bɔ no so na mʼankasa mɛka mo ho.”
31.24: Bere a Mose kyerɛw mmara nsɛm no nyinaa fi mfiase kosii awiei no guu nhoma mu wiei no,
31.25: ɔde saa ahyɛde yi maa Lewifo a na wɔsoa Awurade apam adaka no:
31.26: “Momfa saa Mmara Nhoma yi nkɔto Awurade, mo Nyankopɔn, apam adaka no nkyɛn. Ɛhɔ na ɛbɛda sɛ adansede a etia Israelfo.
31.27: Efisɛ minim sɛnea moyɛ atuatewfo ne asoɔden. Mpo, me ne mo da so wɔ hɔ yi, moatew Awurade so atua. Na me wu akyi no, atua bɛn na morentew!
31.28: Momfrɛ mo mpanyimfo nyinaa ne mo mmusuakuw ntuanofo nyinaa sɛnea metumi akasa akyerɛ wɔn na mafrɛ ɔsoro ne asase de adi adanse atia wɔn.
31.29: Minim sɛ me wu akyi no, mobɛsɛe koraa na moaman afi ɔkwan a makyerɛ mo sɛ momfa so no so. Mmere a ɛreba no, amanehunu bɛba mo so, efisɛ monam bɔne a mobɛyɛ wɔ Awurade anim no so no bɛhwanyan nʼabufuw.”
31.30: Mose DwomEnti Mose kaa dwom no mu nsɛm nyinaa fi ti kosi ti kyerɛɛ Israelfo a wɔahyia hɔ no.

32.1: Monyɛ aso, mo ɔsoro na mɛkasa;tie, wo asase, nsɛm a efi mʼanom.
32.2: Ma me nkyerɛkyerɛ ntɔ sɛ osu;na me nsɛm nsian sɛ obosu,sɛ osu a ɛpete gu sare foforo so,sɛ osu mmoroso wɔ afifide foforo so.
32.3: Mɛbɔ Awurade din.O, monkamfo yɛn Nyankopɔn kɛseyɛ!
32.4: Ɔne Ɔbotan no, ne nnwuma so nni,na nʼakwan nyinaa ye.Onyankopɔn nokwafo a ɔnyɛ mfomso,Ɔtreneeni ne ɔnokwafo ne no.
32.5: Porɔwee adidi wɔn mu na wɔnyɛ ne mma;wɔyɛ awo ntoatoaso akɔntɔnkyefo aniwufo.
32.6: Saa ne ɔkwan a ɛsɛ sɛ mofa so tua Awurade ka ni ana,mo nkwaseafo ne adwenharefo?Ɛnyɛ ɔno ne mo Agya, mo yɛfo no?Ɛnyɛ ɔno na ɔbɔɔ mo na ɔmaa mo nnyinaso?
32.7: Monkae tete nna;munnwen tete awo ntoatoaso no ho.Mummisa mo agya na ɔbɛkyerɛ mo.Mummisa mo mpanyimfo na wɔbɛkyerɛ mo ase.
32.8: Bere a Ɔsorosoroni no maa amanaman no agyapade,na ɔkyekyɛɛ adesamma nyinaa mu no,ɔtotoo ahye maa nnipa nosɛnea Israelmma no dodow te.
32.9: Efisɛ Israelfo yɛ Awurade kyɛfa;Yakob yɛ nʼagyapade wɔde maa no.
32.10: Ohuu no wɔ sare asase so,asase kesee a hwee nni so so.Ɔde no sie hwɛɛ ne so;ɔbɔɔ ne ho ban sɛ nʼaniwa kurutiayisi,
32.11: sɛ ɔkɔre a ɔhwanyan ne berebuw muna ɔbɔ mfamfia fa ne mma ho,na ɔtrɛw ne ntaban mu buma no,soaa no kɔɔ no.
32.12: Awurade nkutoo na ɔkyerɛɛ no kwan;na ananafo nyame biara nka ne ho.
32.13: Ɔma no nantew faa asase no nkoko so;na ɔde mfuw so nnuaba bɔɔ no akɔnhama;Ɔde ɔbotan mu wone ngo a efi abohemaa mu,
32.14: nyɛmmoa mu nufusu ne srade,nguamma ne mmirekyi a wɔadɔ srade,Basan adwennini a wɔpawne atoko muhumuhu siesiee no.Monom nsa papa a efi bobe mu.
32.15: Yeshurun dɔɔ srade na onyaa ahoɔden;aduan ma wɔyɛɛ duru, yɛɛ pemee.Wɔtoo Onyankopɔn a ɔbɔɔ wɔn no asaworam;wɔpoo wɔn Nkwagye Botan no.
32.16: Wɔma ɔtwee ninkunu wɔ wɔn ananafo anyame no hona wɔde wɔn abosom a okyi no hyɛɛ no abufuw.
32.17: Wɔbɔɔ afɔre maa atoro anyame a wɔnyɛ Onyankopɔn,anyame a na wonnim wɔn,anyame a wɔbaa nnansa yi ara,anyame a na mo agyanom nsuro wɔn.
32.18: Mopaa Ɔbotan a ɔyɛɛ mo agya no.Mo werɛ fii Onyankopɔn a ɔwoo mo no.
32.19: Awurade huu eyi na ɔpoo wɔnefisɛ ne mmabarima ne ne mmabea hyɛɛ no abufuw.
32.20: Ɔkae se, “Mede mʼanim behintaw wɔnna wɔahu sɛnea wɔn awiei bɛyɛEfisɛ, wɔyɛ awo ntoatoaso akɔntɔnkyefo;mma a wonni nokware.
32.21: Wɔde nea ɛnyɛ Onyame ahyɛ me ninkutwena wɔde wɔn ahoni ahuhuw no ahyɛ me abufuw.Mɛma wɔn ani abere nnipa a wɔnyɛ me nkurɔfo.Mɛma ɔman a wonni ntease no ahyɛ wɔn abufuw.
32.22: Efisɛ mʼabufuwhyew befita ogya mu,nea ɛhyew kɔka awufo a wɔwɔ asase ase no.Ɛbɛsɛe asase ne so nnɔbaena ɛpaapae mmepɔw fapem.
32.23: “Mɛhɔre amanehunu ahorow no siw wɔ wɔn sona matow me bɛmma awowɔ wɔn.
32.24: Mede ɔkɔm kɛse,atiridiinini ne owuyare a ɛsɛe ade;mɛsoma nkekammoa se aba wɔn so;nhurutoa a wɔtow si wɔ mfutuma mu no ano bɔre.
32.25: Afoa bɛma wɔahwere wɔn mma wɔ abɔnten so;wɔn afi mu, ehu bɛtɔ wɔn so.Mmerante ne mmabaa,mmofra ne nkwakoraa ase bɛhyew.
32.26: Mekae se mɛbɔ wɔn ahwetena mapepa wɔn din afi nnipa adwene mu.
32.27: Nanso misuroo ɔtamfo fɛwdi,anyɛ a na ɔtamfo ante ase aka se,‘Yɛn nsa adi nkonim;Ɛnyɛ Awurade na ɔyɛɛ eyinom nyinaa.’ ”
32.28: Israel yɛ ɔman a wonni adwene.Obi nni wɔn mu a ɔwɔ nhumu.
32.29: Sɛ anka wɔyɛ anyansafo na wɔbɛte eyi ase,na wɔahu nea wɔn awiei bɛyɛ ɛ!
32.30: Ɛbɛyɛ dɛn na onipa baako ataa nnipa apem,na baanu bɛma mpem du aguan,gye sɛ wɔn Botan atɔn wɔngye sɛ Awurade ayi wɔn ama.
32.31: Efisɛ wɔn botan nte sɛ yɛn Botan,sɛnea yɛn atamfo mpo gye to mu no.
32.32: Wɔn bobe fi Sodom bobe muna efi Gomora mfuw mu.Awuduru ahyɛ wɔn bobe aba mma,na bɔnwoma ahyɛ wɔn kasiaw amaama.
32.33: Wɔn bobesa yɛ awɔ ano bɔre;aprammiri ano bɔrewerɛmfo.
32.34: “So menkoraa eyi mmoroso,na mensɔw ano wɔ mʼademude mu ana
32.35: Mɛtɔ were; metua so ka.Wɔn nan bɛwatiri bere a ɛsɛ mu;wɔn atoyerɛnkyɛm no abɛnna wɔn sɛe taa wɔn.”
32.36: Awurade bebu ne nkurɔfo atɛnna wasesa nʼadwene wɔ ne nkoa ho,bere a wahu sɛ wɔn ahoɔden asa,na ɛnkaa obiara, akoa anaa ɔdehye.
32.37: Obebisa se, “Afei wɔn anyame no wɔ he,ɔbotan a wɔde yɛɛ wɔn guankɔbea,
32.38: anyame a wodii wɔn afɔrebɔde mu sradena wɔnom wɔn ɔnom afɔrebɔ mu nsa no?Ma wɔnsɔre mmɛboa mo!Ma womegye mo!
32.39: “Afei, munhu sɛ, me ara me ne no!Onyame biara nni hɔ sɛ me!Me na mikum na mema nkwa:Me na mipira, na mɛkyekye,na obi rentumi nnye mfi me nsam.
32.40: Mema me nsa so kyerɛ ɔsoro de nidi sua sɛ:Sɛ mete ase daa yi,
32.41: sɛ mesew me afoa a ɛpa yerɛwyerɛw nona mifi atemmu mu so mu kuaw a,mɛtɔ mʼatamfo so werena matua wɔn a wokyi me ka.
32.42: Mɛma me bɛmma anom mogya abow,na mʼafoa adi ɔhonam,atɔfo ne nnommumfo mogya,atamfo ntuanofo no ti.”
32.43: Mo aman, mo ne ne nkurɔfo nni ahurusi,efisɛ ɔbɛtɔ ne nkoa mogya so were;ɔbɛtɔ were wɔ nʼatamfo sona wapata ama nʼasase ne ne nkurɔfo.
32.44: Mose ne Nun babarima Hosea ba bɛkaa dwom yi mu nsɛm nyinaa kyerɛɛ nnipa no.
32.45: Mose woroo saa dwom no mu nsɛm no kyerɛɛ Israelfo no wiee no,
32.46: ɔka kaa ho se, “Momfa nsɛm a maka akyerɛ mo no nyinaa nsie mo koma mu. Monka nkyerɛ mo mma nso, sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a wobedi saa mmara yi mu nsɛm nyinaa so pɛpɛɛpɛ.
32.47: Saa nkyerɛkyerɛ yi nyɛ nsɛm bi a wɔde rema mo kwa, ɛyɛ mo nkwa! Sɛ mudi so a, mubenyin akyɛ wɔ asase a moretwa Asubɔnten Yordan akɔfa no so.”
32.48: Mose WuDa no ara, Awurade ka kyerɛɛ Mose se,
32.49: “Kɔ Moab, kɔ mmepɔw a ɛwɔ asu no apuei no so, na foro Nebo bepɔw a ɛne Yeriko di nhwɛanim no. To wʼani hwɛ Kanaan asase no, asase a mede rema Israelfo sɛ wɔn agyapade no.
32.50: Bepɔw a woaforo no so hɔ na wobɛkɔ akɔka wʼagyanom ho, sɛnea wo nua Aaron wuu wɔ Hor bepɔw so kɔkaa nʼagyanom ho no.
32.51: Efisɛ mo baanu dii me huammɔ wɔ Israelfo mu wɔ Meriba ne Kades asu ho wɔ Sin sare so. Moanni me kronkronyɛ ho adanse ankyerɛ Israelfo no wɔ hɔ.
32.52: Ɛno nti, mubehu asase no afi akyiri, nanso morenkɔ asase a mede rema Israelfo no so.”

33.1: Mose Hyira Mmusuakuw NoEyi ne nhyira a Onyankopɔn nipa Mose de hyiraa Israelfo no ansa na ɔrewu:
33.2: Ose, “Awurade fi Sinai baeofi Seir baa wɔn so;ɔhran fi Paran bepɔw so.Ɔde akronkronfo pii baefi anafo fam ne mmepɔw nsian so.
33.3: Nokware ni, wo na wodɔ nnipa no,akronkronfo nyinaa wɔ wo nsam.Wɔn nyinaa kotow wo nan ase,na wonya nkyerɛkyerɛ fi wo hɔ,
33.4: mmara a Mose de maa yɛn no;Yakob nkurɔfo agyapade.
33.5: Ɔyɛɛ ɔhene wɔ Yeshurunbere a nnipa no ntuanofo hyiae,wɔne Israel mmusuakuw no.
33.6: “Ma Ruben nya nkwa na onwu,na mma ne nkurɔfo so nhuan.”
33.7: Na ɔkaa eyi faa Yuda ho:“Tie, Awurade, tie Yuda sufrɛ;fa no brɛ ne nkurɔfo.Ɔde nʼankasa nsa bɔ ne ho ban.Ao, yɛ ne boafo tia nʼatamfo!”
33.8: Asɛm a ɔka faa Lewi abusuakuw ho:“Awurade, wode ade kronkronama wʼasomfo nokwafo Lewifo.Wosɔɔ wɔn hwɛe wɔ Masawɔne wɔn koe wɔ Meriba asu ho.
33.9: Lewifo tiee wʼasɛmbɔɔ wʼapam no ho ban.Wodii wo nokwaresen sɛnea wodii wɔn awofo,abusuafo ne wɔn mma nokware.
33.10: Afei, ma wɔnkyerɛ Yakob wo mmara no.Ma wɔmfa wo nkyerɛkyerɛ no mma Israelfo.Wɔde aduhuam bɛba wʼanimAbɛbɔ ɔhyew afɔre wɔ afɔremuka so.
33.11: Hyira Lewifo, Ao Awuradena ma wɔn nsa ano nnwuma nsɔ wʼani.Bubu wɔn atamfo;bɔ wɔn atamfo hwe fam a wɔnsɔre bio.”
33.12: Asɛm a Mose ka faa Benyamin abusuakuw ho:“Ma Awurade dɔ nnye ntin wɔ Benyamin nkurɔfo mu,efisɛ ɔbɔ wɔn ho ban daa nyinaa,na nea Awurade dɔ no no nhome wɔ ne nwini ase daa.”
33.13: Asɛm a Mose ka faa Yosef mmusuakuw ho:“Awurade mfa ne sorosoro bosu a ɛsom bone bun mu nsu a efi asase ase no,nhyira wɔn nsase.
33.14: Ɔmfa ne nnepa efi owia mu bane adonne a ebetumi apue afi ɔsram so;
33.15: ne nnɔbae pa a efi tete mmepɔw mune nea abu so wɔ nkoko a etim hɔ daa mu
33.16: ne akyɛde a ɛso nni a efi asase ne ne mayɛ mu,ne adom a efi nea na ɔte nwura a ɛhyew mu no.Saa nhyira yi nyinaa mmra Yosef ti so,nea ɔyɛ ne nuanom mu ɔheneba no anintɔn mu.
33.17: Yosef sɛ nantwinini a ɔyɛ abakan wɔ ahenni mu.Ne ahoɔden te sɛ ɔtrɔm mmɛn.Ɔde bɛwowɔ aman no,wɔn a wɔwɔ asase ano no mpo.Eyinom ne Efraim mpem du du no;eyinom ne Manase mpempem no.”
33.18: Asɛm a Mose ka faa Sebulon ne Isakar mmusuakuw ho:“Sebulon asefo, munni anigye wɔ mo adifi mu.Isakar asefo, munni anigye wɔ mo ntamadan mu.
33.19: Wɔbɛfrɛ nnipa ahorow akɔ bepɔw no sokɔbɔ trenee afɔre wɔ hɔ;wobefi po mu adenya mmoroso mu ato ponafi ademude a ahintaw wɔ nwea mu.”
33.20: Asɛm a Mose ka faa Gad abusuakuw ho:“Nhyira nka obi a ɔtrɛw Gad mantam mu!Gad te hɔ sɛ gyataa ɔretetew abasa anaa eti.
33.21: Gad nkurɔfo paw asase pa no maa wɔn ho;ɔkannifo kyɛfa na wɔde maa wɔn.Bere a nkurɔfo no mpanyimfo hyiae no,wɔyɛɛ Awurade atɛntrenee apɛde no,ne nʼatemmu a ɛfa Israelfo ho no.”
33.22: Asɛm a Mose ka faa Dan abusuakuw ho:“Dan yɛ gyata ba a,ɔrepue afi Basan.”
33.23: Asɛm a Mose ka faa Naftali abusuakuw ho:“Naftali wɔ adom bebreena Awurade nhyira ayɛ wo ma;ɔtare no anafo fam bɛyɛ wo kyɛfa.”
33.24: Asɛm a Mose ka faa Aser abusuakuw ho:“Mma no mu nea wɔahyira no koraa ne Aser;wɔmma ne nuanom mpɛ nʼasɛm,na ɔmfa ngo nguare nʼanan ase.
33.25: Wʼapon ho nkyerewa nyɛ dade ne kɔbere mfrafrae;wʼahoɔden ne wo nkwanna bɛsae so.
33.26: “Onyankopɔn biara nni hɔ sɛ Yeshurun Nyankopɔn;a ɔnam ɔsorosoro ne nʼahenni mu mununkumso ba bɛboa wo.
33.27: Onyankopɔn a ɔwɔ hɔ daa yɛ wo guankɔbea;nea ɛwɔ ase no ne abasa a ɛwɔ hɔ daa no.Ɔbɛpam wʼatamfo afi wʼanim;ɔbɛka se, ‘Sɛe wɔn!’
33.28: Enti, Israel bɛtena ase dwoodwoo;Yakob benya bammɔwɔ asase a atoko ne nsa foforo wɔ so,faako a ɔsoro bosu gugu.
33.29: Nhyira nka mo, Israel!Hena na ɔte sɛ mo,nnipa a Awurade agye mo nkwa.Ɔyɛ mo nkatabo ne boafone mo anuonyam afoa!Mo atamfo bɛkotow mo anim,na moatiatia wɔn sorɔnsorɔmmea.”

34.1: Mose WuNa Mose fi Moab asase tataw so foro kɔɔ Nebo Bepɔw so, san foroo Pisga a etwa Yeriko. Ɛhɔ na Awurade kyerɛɛ no asase no nyinaa, efi Gilead kosi Dan;
34.2: Naftali nsase nyinaa; Efraim ne Manase nsase; Yuda nsase nyinaa kosi Ntam Po no ho;
34.3: Negeb; ne nsase a efi Yeriko Bon, ne Mmɛ Kuropɔn no de kosi Soar tɔnn.
34.4: Na Awurade ka kyerɛɛ Mose se, “Eyi ne asase a mekaa ntam hyɛɛ ho bɔ kyerɛɛ Abraham, Isak ne Yakob se mede bɛma wɔn asefo no. Afei, mama wo de wʼani ahu, nanso worentwa nkɔ so.”
34.5: Na Mose, Awurade somfo no wuu wɔ Moab asase so sɛnea Awurade kae no.
34.6: Wosiee no wɔ obon bi a ɛne Bet-Peor di nhwɛanim, nanso ebesi nnɛ, obiara nnim faako a ne da wɔ.
34.7: Mose dii mfirihyia ɔha ne aduonu na owui, nanso na nʼani hu ade yiye na ne ho nso yɛ den.
34.8: Israelfo suu no nnafua aduasa wɔ Moab tataw so ara kosii sɛ nʼayiyɛ kɔɔ awiei.
34.9: Afei, Nun babarima Yosua nyaa nyansa honhom, efisɛ Mose de ne nsa guu ne so. Enti Israelfo yɛɛ osetie maa no na wɔyɛɛ biribiara sɛnea Awurade hyɛɛ Mose no ara pɛ.
34.10: Mose akyi no, odiyifo biara mmaa Israel a Awurade nim no anim ne anim
34.11: a Awurade somaa no ma ɔkɔyɛɛ anwonwade ne nsɛnkyerɛnne a ɛyɛ hu wɔ Misraim asase so de tiaa Farao ne ne mpanyimfo nyinaa wɔ asase no so nyinaa.
34.12: Na obiara nnaa tumi kɛse anaa ahodwiriw nneyɛe adi te sɛnea Mose yɛɛ wɔ Israel nyinaa ani so no.
